summary: Changes enchantment on Thieves Guild Boots, Improved Thieves Guild Boots and Guild Master\'s Boots from Fortify Pickpocket to Fortify Sneak
descriptionHtml:
Changes enchantment on Thieves Guild Boots, Improved Thieves Guild Boots and Guild Master\'s Boots. Enchantments on all other Thieves Guild Armor parts, as well as the item stats are [i]unchanged[/i].

• Thieves Guild Boots (Normal ones you get after joining the Thieves Guild):
   From Fortify Pickpocket by 15% to Fortify Sneak by 15%
• Thieves Guild Boots (Improved ones, you can possibly get them after you complete the Scoundrel\'s Folly quest in the Thieves Guild Storyline):
   From Fortify Pickpocket by 25% to Fortify Sneak by 25%
• Guild Master\'s Boots (You get them after completing the Under New Management Quest and becoming the Thieves Guild Master):
   From Fortify Pickpocket by 35% to Fortify Sneak by 35%

The reason I created this mod is a bug in the game; basically it makes all Fortify Pickpocket Enchantments in the game [i]lower[/i] your chances of succeeding instead of increasing them. 
Here\'s how Skyrim Wiki describes it:
[i]
Any form of Fortify Pickpocket actually subtracts x% from the success rate when it should be adding that same x% to the success rate.
E.g., Thieves Guild boots subtract 15% chance of success instead of adding 15%.
[/i]

This bug is well-known and present on all platforms. It still is present in the version 1.9.32.0.8 of the game.
______________________________________
Steam Workshop Version: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=144547060
author: N0stalgia
